ShortDescriptions.ShortDescription: At the Business Centre, customers can work as though they were in their own office. Health and beauty facilities include Sauna. Pets not allowed.
The rooms have Central Air Conditioning, Central Heating, Laundry Service and Room-Service We also have Wi-Fi and Business Centre. Activities and relax: Sauna. Cuisine: . . Credit Cards: .
